mapper.insert: insert into favorite(user_id, sidoName, gugunname, dongName) select * from (select #{userId},#{sidoName}, #{gugunName}, #{dongName}) as tmp where not exists (select user_id, sidoName, gugunName, dongName from favorite where user_id=#{userId} and sidoName=#{sidoName} and gugunName=#{gugunName} and dongName=#{dongName} ) limit 1;
mapper.select: select d.sidoName sidoName, d.gugunName gugunName, hi.dong dongName, hi.apartmentName aptName, hd.dealYear dealYear, hd.dealAmount dealAmount from houseinfo hi inner join housedeal hd on hi.aptCode = hd.aptCode inner join dongcode d on hi.dong = d.dongName where d.sidoName = #{sidoName} and d.gugunName = #{gugunName} and hi.dong=#{dongName};
select num, user_id, sidoName, gugunName, dongName from favorite where user_id=#{userId}
